portal.healthScores.title: Understanding Your Building Health Scores
portal.healthScores.explanation: Each building receives a health grade from A (Excellent) to F (Critical) based on a 100-point scale. Buildings scoring 90+ earn an A, 80-89 get a B, 70-79 receive a C, 60-69 get a D, and anything below 60 is rated F.
portal.healthScores.howCalculatedDesc: We evaluate three key factors—when the building was last inspected (40% of score), the number of critical issues found (30% of score), and how regularly maintenance is performed (30% of score).
